name: Unfinished Undefined
description:
2D Action Role Playing Game Summary
  • you are in charge of defeating the rulers of the world (as usual)
  • you make a player (character and player are different things)
  • You will choose 2 characters, 1 character will be mele and 1 character will be the range
  • You will use this character as a weapon to conquer the dungeon, the stronger your character, the easier your adventure will be.
  • You can increase your character's LVL by exploring the world
  • crafting: you can make food and make materials to strengthen your character.

note : basic functions have not been fully created


Attention : 
  • This Game Is Still In The Prototype Stage and Will Updated Nightly
  • Need an Internet connection to check and download game resource
  • Download link on this page is a dynamic file , if the game asks for an update (version), please download the same file on this page.
  • Even though I gave the repository link, it is highly recommended to download the update in the game so that everything goes effortlessly.
  • Screenshot and data when you create in-game Report will be store Here
  • every feedback is very much appreciated 🤝
